Title: Winnie the Pooh: A Very Merry Pooh Year
Genre: Animation, Comedy, Drama, Family, Fantasy, Musical
Director: Gary Katona, Ed Wexler, Jamie Mitchell
Writer: Brian Hohlfeld, Ted Henning, Karl Geurs, Mark Zaslove
Actors: Jim Cummings, Peter Cullen, John Fiedler, Michael Gough
Plot: Ring in the season with Winnie The Pooh in a holiday adventure.
